mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currval)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=sysdate where seq=#{seq}
update board set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step > #{step}
mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref, lev, step, pseq) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{lev}, #{step}, #{pseq})
mapper.update: update board set reply=reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
update board set reply=reply-1 where seq=(select pseq from board where seq=#{seq})
update board set subject = '[원글이 삭제된 답글] '||subject where pseq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board where ${opt} like '%'|| #{condition} ||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) from board where ${opt} like '%'||#{condition}||'%'
